amendment.description: Amendment strikes language in the bill providing $15 million to perform a historical accounting of each Individual Indian Money Account open on December 31, 2000, covering the period from the date on which the account was opened or January 1, 1985, whichever is later, to December 31, 2000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike provisions in the bill providing $15 million to perform a historical accounting of each Individual Indian Money Account open on December 31, 2000, covering the period from the date on which the account was opened or January 1, 1985, whichever is later, to December 31, 2000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rahall amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 281 - 144 (Roll no. 311).
